body:
Good.
The patch will be merged on trunk and released by 1.60
@ivandeex is this a small fix? If so we could squeeze it into 1.59?

off @ncw
pls take a look at them milestones n' deadlines and change to ur taste
Mmm, headlines and deadlines... I'd like to do the very delayed 1.59 soon (week or two) - I'll make an issue about it... So enough time to squeeze a small fix in.

> very delayed 1.59 soon (week or two)

1.58 you mean ;)

issue.title: Rclone 1.58 release

repository.name: rclone
repository.description: "rsync for cloud storage" - Google Drive, S3, Dropbox, Backblaze B2, One Drive, Swift, Hubic, Wasabi, Google Cloud Storage, Azure Blob, Azure Files, Yandex Files

issue.body:
The rclone 1.58 release is overdue - this is mostly due to me having to take a bit of time off the project as I felt the burn out approaching. I've recovered now, so let's make a release!

Outstanding items:
- I'd like to release 1.58 without `replace` lines in the go mod. We can either hard fork `github.com/jlaffaye/ftp` or update to use it. I did try compiling with upstream and it looks like they've taken your patches @ivandeex. Which option do you prefer a) hard fork b) revert to use upstream?
- If the fix for https://github.com/rclone/rclone/issues/6003 is small I'd like to get that in (usually they are just `s/int/int64/` but I haven't looked at the specifics). I'm happy to cherry pick this from your repo @ivandeex 
- I have a couple of other almost finished small things to merge

Anything else? Any outstanding PRs which desperately should be merged @rclone/rclone ?

I'm planning that this release should be released with go1.17 - I suspect go1.18 when it arrives will be disruptive.

#### How to use GitHub

* Please use the üëç [reaction](https://blog.github.com/2016-03-10-add-reactions-to-pull-requests-issues-and-comments/) to show that you are affected by the same issue.
* Please don't comment if you have no relevant information to add. It's just extra noise for everyone subscribed to this issue.
* Subscribe to receive notifications on status change and new comments.

body: I've merged this to fix master now which means it will be in [the latest beta](https://beta.rclone.org/) in 15-30 minutes and released in v1.58 - thank you @ivandeex

issue.title: json Unmarshal issue on int type json fields in realtime structs

repository.name: go-ftx
repository.description: go-ftx is API wrapper for FTX exchange, with go.

issue.body:
I have recently noticed a bunch of warning messages of the form:

```
2022/03/10 03:21:40 [WARN]: cant unmarshal orderbook json: cannot unmarshal number 3018249120 into Go struct field Orderbook.checksum of type int
```
And 
```
2022/03/10 03:21:17 [WARN]: cant unmarshal trades json: cannot unmarshal number 3495842160 into Go struct field Trade.id of type int
```

These numbers aren't too big to be ints so not sure what's going on here
